title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements for the QuantumPortfolioOptimizer system, including functional and non-functional requirements, performance targets, integration with existing systems, and regulatory compliance considerations.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the quantum computing component, data processing pipeline, user interface, and integration with external data sources. Define the system's components, their interactions, and the technology stack. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance requirements.

title: Quantum Computing Module Development
description: Develop the quantum computing module responsible for portfolio optimization calculations, leveraging quantum algorithms and hardware.

title: Data Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data processing pipeline for ingesting and preprocessing financial data, feeding it into the quantum computing module, and processing the results.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the QuantumPortfolioOptimizer system, allowing users to input parameters, view results, and manage their portfolios.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security and compliance standards, including data privacy regulations and secure handling of financial information.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including cloud resources, containerization, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
